metadata.jobDescription:
Senior/Principal Product Manager (US) at Crossmint

Crossmint is an enterprise-grade stablecoin infrastructure provider serving 40,000+
clients including MoneyGram and WireX. Backed by Ribbit Capital and Franklin Templeton.

Core Responsibilities:
- Guide full lifecycle from ideation and requirements gathering to launch and iteration
- Establish product vision, analyze performance metrics
- Lead payment and tokenization initiatives
- Monitor competitive landscape
- Collaborate across engineering, design, and marketing teams

Required Qualifications:
- 5+ years product management experience with proven track record
- Web3 hands-on expertise and understanding of technical/market dynamics
- Background architecting API-driven products or developer platforms

Bonus Qualifications:
- Founder experience
- Crypto infrastructure, wallet products, or developer tooling background
- Fast-paced innovation environment experience

Compensation: $190K-$225K depending on level
Location: NYC or Miami (hybrid), remote options available

hero.subheadline: Senior PM with 8 years shipping Web3 developer infrastructure—from Wallet-as-a-Service at Forte to API platforms serving 1M+ daily requests at Ankr. I've built the exact stack Crossmint runs: wallets, APIs, SDKs, multi-chain infrastructure.

about.tagline: Eight years building the infrastructure layer that lets developers ship Web3 products without becoming blockchain experts.
bio:
I've spent my career at the intersection of developer platforms and crypto infrastructure. At Forte, I led Wallet-as-a-Service using MPC custody—the same architecture powering Crossmint's embedded wallets. At Ankr, I shipped Advanced APIs (NFT, Token, Query) serving 1M+ daily requests and drove 15× revenue growth by pivoting from commodity RPC to differentiated developer tools. At Dapper, I improved developer onboarding by 60% through CLI and tooling improvements. This is exactly what Crossmint does: make blockchain invisible so developers can focus on their products.
Now at Anchorage Digital, I ship institutional-grade crypto infrastructure—ETH staking with zero slashing events, 7+ L2 integrations across chains like Base, Optimism, and Arbitrum. I understand both the developer experience that drives adoption and the enterprise rigor that wins MoneyGram and Visa as clients. With my AI Product Management Certificate and hands-on experience integrating AI tools, I'm ready to help Crossmint lead in agentic commerce.

caseStudies.reasoning: API platform, SDK development, 15× revenue growth—direct match for developer platform PM
Institutional crypto infrastructure, enterprise clients—matches Crossmint's enterprise focus
Blockchain payment system, enterprise scale—maps to payment/tokenization initiatives

projects.reasoning: Co-founder experience, Web3 SaaS, SDK development—matches bonus qualifications
